content: >the shorter length and airy stitch combine to give this poncho a fresh look dress it up or dress it down just by changing the color of the yarn pattern number 1302 skill level easy level 2 size small/medium medium/large measurements 16 20 long x 48 52 around at lower edge lion brand jiffy 135yrds/123m 3oz/85g white - 3 4 balls crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm gauge 8 sts x 8 row = 4 / 10 cm in us half_double_crochet poncho is worked in the round in half_double_crochet from neck to lower edge free registration at site required to access patterns
